content: Singaporean legal drama TV seriesThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Young Justice Bao" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(October 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* ***Young Justice Bao*** ([Simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese): 侠义包公) is a 25-episode ancient legal drama series produced by the [Television Corporation of Singapore](/wiki/Television_Corporation_of_Singapore) in 1994. The drama stars [Chew Chor Meng](/wiki/Chew_Chor_Meng) as the legendary [Song Dynasty](/wiki/Song_Dynasty) jurist [Bao Zheng](/wiki/Bao_Zheng). ## Cast - [Chew Chor Meng](/wiki/Chew_Chor_Meng) as [Bao Zheng](/wiki/Bao_Zheng) - [Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei) as [Bai Yutang](/wiki/Bai_Yutang) - [Zhang Xinxiang](/wiki/Zhang_Xinxiang) as [Zhan Zhao](/wiki/Zhan_Zhao) - Eugena Lee as Li Ke - Cherie Lim as Li Jue - [Chen Shucheng](/wiki/Chen_Shucheng) as Li Wenye - [Richard Low](/wiki/Richard_Low) as [Imperial Tutor Pang](/wiki/Imperial_Tutor_Pang) - Fu Youming as [Pang Yu](/wiki/Pang_Yu) - [Chen Tianwen](/wiki/Chen_Tianwen) as [Di Qing](/wiki/Di_Qing) - Wang Guanwu as [Emperor Renzong of Song](/wiki/Emperor_Renzong_of_Song) - Zhou Shiqiang as [Wen Yanbo](/wiki/Wen_Yanbo_(Song_dynasty)) - Zhu Yuye as [Empress Dowager Liu](/wiki/Empress_Liu_(Zhenzong)) - Liang Tian as Guo Huai - Lin Xiulian as [Kou Zhu](/wiki/Kou_Zhu) - Huang Shaoting as [Consort Li](/wiki/Consort_Li_(Zhenzong)) - Yang Tianfu as Wang Chao - Wu Kaishen as Ma Han - Lin Qinyuan as Fan Zonghua - Li Yuejie as Yelü Xiong - [Li Yinzhu](/wiki/Li_Yinzhu) as [Xiao Yanyan](/wiki/Xiao_Yanyan) - "Will the real Bao please stand up?". *[The Straits Times](/wiki/The_Straits_Times)*. 1994-06-22. This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Young Justice Bao
